summary: Avoiding a "brain drain" in the federal workforce Avoiding a "brain drain" in the federal workforce With more than 30% of federal employees eligible to retire by 2019, a lot of jobs could open up that the current federal workforce can't fill. So, the government needs to recruit and retain the next generation of workers. Strong employee engagement—a positive feeling about one's employer and its...
title: Federal Workforce: Lessons Learned for Engaging Millennials and Other Age Groups
